articles.title: Deals: Make Epic Savings on PS5 in Meaty PS Direct Summer Sale - Push Square
Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 undercuts Honor Magic V5 in crucial area despite official claims - Notebookcheck
articles.description: Officially, the Honor Magic V5 is said to be thinner than the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 when opting for the former's Ivory White variant. Independent analysis suggests that the Galaxy Z Fold7 could be the thinnest foldable around, though.

articles.title: Car Keys are coming to the Wallet app for 13 new vehicle brands soon - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple recently announced 13 new vehicle brands that will soon support Car Key in the Wallet app for iPhone and Apple Watch. Here’s the list.
